original: By: Värde Partners, Inc., its General Partner By: /s/ David A. Marple Name: David A. Marple Title: General Counsel VÄRDE PARTNERS, INC.
ollama_generated: In the event that any litigation, claim, or dispute (collectively, "Dispute") arises between the parties regarding this Agreement or the transactions contemplated herein, Counsel shall have sole discretion to resolve such Dispute through negotiation, mediation, or arbitration. If resolution is not achieved through these means within sixty (60) days, Värde may initiate legal proceedings, with Counsel acting as an advisor and consultant only, and without any liability or responsibility for the outcome of such proceedings. However, in the event that Värde elects to pursue legal action, it shall be bound by any agreement reached between Counsel and the opposing party regarding the scope, nature, and timing of such proceedings, subject to court approval where necessary. This provision does not limit or waive any immunity or privilege enjoyed by Värde or its affiliates under applicable law.
